price: 27.Qibaadáh Yallat agleh xakabtan mara yoo uybulluya keenik ixxic, wonna hinna Yalli agleyta mali, Valii Usuk maysoliiy, naggaarâ kal.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul arūniya alladhīna alḥaqtum bihi shurakāa kallā bal huwa al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
